actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To ensure that public housing dwelling units are occupied by low-income families, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fairness in Public Housing Act of 2016

summary.text:
Fairness in Public Housing Act of 2016 

This bill amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to require public housing agencies to terminate the tenancy of families residing in public housing that have an income exceeding 125% of the area median income. The bill allows an exception to this requirement if, at the time of the termination, there are no families on the waiting list or applying for public housing administered by the agency.

titles.title: Fairness in Public Housing Act of 2016
To ensure that public housing dwelling units are occupied by low-income families, and for other purposes.
